description:
Logicool Gaming Software lets you customize Logicool G gaming mice, keyboards, headsets and select wheels.

Logicool Gaming Software includes third-party software components, libraries, and frameworks, including, but not limited to, the third-party software listed below:

Digia QT - Application and User Interface Framework
Microsoft Runtime Libraries - Application and Hardware Support
These included third party software components provide key functionality to Logicool Gaming Software and are included in the software installation package.
summary: Lets you customize functions on Logicool gaming mice, keyboards, headsets, and select wheels.
author: https://gaming.logicool.co.jp
